QuestData.Title: On Ebon Wings
QuestData.Description: Now we bring our fight to the Adherents. Raastok is certain his new invention will give us control of the Apexis weapons, but we must get close - very close.$B$BKa'alu and her ravens will fly us to the Windswept Terrace. We shall gain a foothold there before pressing on to the Terrace of Dawn.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $2oa Adherents and Windkeeper Koreyx. Speak with Ka'alu for a ride to Windswept Terrace.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work!$B$BNow, it is time for the next phase of our plan.
